comments:
Description:
AutoText doesn't support scripting functions such as onPrepare, onCreate and
onRender.
It doesn't support java-based event handler, either.
 
Build number:
2.2.0.v20061208-0754
 
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the attached design file, choose the chart.
 
Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.
 
Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
 
Error log:
java.lang.Error: Unresolved compilation problem: 
	The method buildGeneralPage(Composite, String[], String[], String[], AttributesUtil.PageWrapper[], Object) in the type AttributesUtil is not applicable for the arguments (Composite, String[], String[], AttributesUtil.PageWrapper[], Object)


	at org.eclipse.birt.chart.reportitem.ui.dialogs.ChartGeneralTabUIImpl.buildUI(ChartGeneralTabUIImpl.java:54)

	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.editors.schematic.extensions.ExtendedItemPageGenerator.createTabItems(ExtendedItemPageGenerator.java:47)

	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.views.attributes.AttributesBuilder.createPages(AttributesBuilder.java:82)
